title: Sorry for the long time away....
content:
Hello Friends!
Seems like forever I have posted on the blog and when I looked at the last post, it has been!  I decided to take some time away from daily crafting and enjoy the summer.  That doesn't mean my machines were idle at all!!!  Hubby and I have been doing lots of traveling and enjoying the freedom of the beautiful summer weather we have been having which I will hate to see go away.  We are leaving on another trip today and might be the last one till December when we go to Disney!  I will be back next week with some posts and some shares.  Hope you have had the best summer ever!!!
